The AI for Health Book

This document excerpt discusses the second edition of the AI for Health Digital Book, which highlights how health organizations perceive and apply data & AI within their value chain and as an ecosystem. The book gathers insights from a large panel of respondents to an online survey and 20+ deep-dive interviews with key players from private companies and public institutions.

Key Concepts:

  • Artificial Intelligence in Healthcare
  • Data-Driven Decision Making
  • Digital Transformation in Healthcare
AI Healthcare Data Analytics
